title: policy rules
extract: 1. Authoritative statement of what to do or not to do in a specific situation, issued by an appropriate person or body. It clarifies, demarcates, or interprets a law or policy. 2. Statement that establishes a principle or standard, and serves as a norm for guiding or mandating action or conduct.
extract_html: 1. Authoritative statement of what to do or not to do in a specific situation, issued by an appropriate person or body. It clarifies, demarcates, or interprets a law or policy. 2. Statement that establishes a principle or standard, and serves as a norm for guiding or mandating action or conduct.
